items.title: Remembering John Simon
items.description: NR’s longtime film critic belonged to a more cultivated, discerning age.

items.title: Washington Gave Bigotry No Sanction. We Should Do the Same
items.description: The measure of American pluralism has never been how well we tolerate those who already think like us.

items.title: How Did Katie Couric Become an Elder Stateswoman of Journalism?
items.description: She has not earned this status.

items.title: Supreme Court Must Stop the Left’s Assault on Pro-Life Pregnancy Centers
items.description: The First Amendment rights of pro-life groups and their financial supporters are under attack.

items.title: Pete Hegseth’s ‘Kill Everybody’ Command
items.description: The secretary of war’s alleged order that led to drug boat–strike survivors’ being killed appears to be a violation of the norms of warfare.
